title: Element
description: An rule for how to parse an element

value.description: the hardcoded value or handlebars expresion to use

attributes.description: attributes of each element that can be applied

length.description: handles truncation and padding of the value after compilation

min.description: minimum number of bytes the value must be

max.description: maximum number of bytes the value can be

padding.description: specifies which character to use to pad the value. (Default: " ")
